content.heading: Welcome
content.text:
This session explores the concept of Help Now! Strategies.

Find a comfortable position and begin the exercise when you are ready.

content.heading: Reflection
content.text: You can take notes on a piece of paper or just mental notes in your head. And there is no right or wrong here, our answers are our own.

How did you experience the Help Now! Strategies? 

Did you find that some effected you differently to others?
content.heading: Reflection
What are some things you learned today about sensations?
What are some words that describe sensations?
How can knowing sensations help us be happier and kinder?
When do you think it might be useful to use these strategies?

content.text: Well done. Today, we’ve explored and tried out Help Now! Strategies. These are simple and immediate techniques for helping us return to the resilient zone when we get “bumped out” of that zone.
content.heading: Resilience

content.text:
If we're up for it, we can continue with a mission: Practice using three Help Now! Strategies on three different days this week. 

Plan the steps you will take by considering moments when Help Now! strategies might help you during your week.
content.heading: Resilience

en.name: Help Now!

hostNotes.text: > Press play to start the exercise

en.description: Help Now! Strategies are easy actions that can be practiced to quickly return our bodies and minds to the present moment, and thus function as useful ways to bring our bodies and minds back to a place of balance.

hostNotes.text:
Welcome. I am X and today we will work for around 30 minutes on xx

We’ll be doing xx ex. meditation followed by time for reflection and sharing with each other.

Let’s start with a mini check-in. How are you feeling right now? Please answer in two-three words. X, would you like to start?

> Let everyone in the session, including yourself, check in one by one.

Thank you all for checking in. Let’s get started.

Find a comfortable position. I will start the audio exercise and we'll meet back here afterwards. 

> Push play to start the audio exercise

Now we’ll take 1 minute to reflect on our own.

xxMain question

xxFurther explanations of main question if needed

You can take notes on a piece of paper or just mental notes in your head. And there is no right or wrong here, our answers are our own. 1 minute starting now.

> Press play to start the timer.

That’s 1 minute and it’s time to move on.

Now we are getting into the sharing part. We have three rules for sharing:

1. **What is said in here, stays in here.**
2. **All you need to do is listen.** There is no fixing, helping or advice-giving needed. We are just showing up and exploring what ourselves and others are going through.

3. **Everything on the inside is okay.** Anger, love, hatred, sadness. Whatever shows up. No wrongs, no rights. It is what it is.

There will be a timer set for 2 minutes as an indicator. If you don’t want to share you can always say ‘pass’.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone (or as many as you got time for) share one by one. Press play to start the timer. Re-start for each new sharing.

Thank you so much everyone.

Well done. If you’re up for it, you can continue what we started here today with a mission to bring this into your everyday life.

xx mission description

Before we leave this space let’s do a mini check-out. 

How are you feeling right now? Has anything shifted? Please answer in two-three words.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone in the session check out one by one.

Thank you all for checking out and for joining this session today.

> Finish session to send everyone off to the exit experience.

content.text:
Well done.

Summary.

If you’re up for it, you can continue with this mission.

mission description

hostNotes.text: > Start the session when you're ready to go

pt-BR.description: Estratégias de "Ajuda Agora!" são ações simples que podem ser praticadas para rapidamente trazer nossos corpos e mentes de volta ao momento presente, funcionando assim como formas úteis de restaurar o equilíbrio físico e mental.

hostNotes.text: >Pressione play para iniciar o exercício

pt-BR.name: Ajuda Agora!

content.heading: Bem-vindo(a)
content.text:
Esta sessão explora o conceito de Estratégias Ajuda Agora!

Encontre uma posição confortável e comece o exercício quando estiver pronto(a).

content.heading: Reflexão
content.text: Você pode anotar em um papel ou apenas mentalmente. Não há certo ou errado aqui, nossas respostas são pessoais.

content.heading: Reflexão
content.text:
Como você experimentou as Estratégias Ajuda Agora!?

Você percebeu que algumas tiveram efeitos diferentes em você em comparação com outras?

content.heading: Quais foram algumas coisas que você aprendeu hoje sobre sensações?
Como saber sobre sensações pode nos ajudar a ser mais felizes e gentis?
Quando você acha que pode ser útil usar essas estratégias?
Resiliência
content.text: Muito bem. Hoje, exploramos e experimentamos as estratégias “Ajude Agora!”. São técnicas simples e imediatas para nos ajudar a voltar para a zona de resiliência quando somos “tirados” dessa zona.

content.heading: Resiliência
content.text:
Se quisermos, podemos continuar com uma sugestão: praticar três Estratégias Ajuda Agora! em três dias diferentes desta semana.

Planeje os passos que você vai tomar, considerando momentos em que as estratégias Ajuda Agora! possam te ajudar ao longo da semana
